metadata.name: Neon
metadata.description:
Neon,

It's a time when the future, the metaverse, avatars and communities stare into the very heart of what is language,  intelligence, art and existence.

A Zal4dw 'When its gone its gone' Open edition for 24 hours.

Purchase will also by happy coincidence get you added to future collector editions whitelist for additional works.
